lines: And as you pass through that, and through another airlock, you do actually make it into the med bay, and there you see Lucas, for the first time since you met him in the voidfish's chambers.

speaker: Magnus
lines: Lucas, fix my friend! I don't know what happened!

speaker: Griffin
lines: Lucas— Lucas has a big bandage on his head? He has a big, like, bloody bandage on his head? But he says, like,

speaker: Lucas
lines: What did you do to that dwarf?!

speaker: Magnus
lines: Well—

speaker: Taako
lines: You said you needed us to give you a hand!

speaker: [Travis, Clint, and Justin all do comedy "Ah!" reactions]
Lucas
lines: Seriously, what did you guys—

speaker: Griffin
lines: Before he can finish that sentence, Killian actually grabs him and picks him up. And is like,

speaker: Killian
lines: This has been the worst, shittiest day ever, we are two people down, your lab SUCKS.

speaker: Magnus
lines: Fix my friend!

speaker: Lucas
lines: You better put me down if you want me to help him!

speaker: Magnus
lines: Killian...

speaker: Griffin
lines: Carey's like

speaker: Carey
lines: Yeah, guys, can we take this thing— just bring it down just a little bit, let's figure out how to help Merle out right now.

speaker: Clint
lines: Meanwhile, bleed bleed bleed bleed bleed!

speaker: Griffin
lines: Lucas grabs him like,

speaker: Lucas
lines: Help me put him up on this table. Magnus, use your big strong- your big strong- [Travis Fishlifters.] arm-removing arms—

speaker: Travis
lines: I do it.

speaker: Lucas
lines: How ironic that your big strong arms are only good at one thing, and that's removing other people’s arms.

speaker: Magnus
lines: Yeah. It's very ironic.

speaker: Travis
lines: I put him on the table.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay. Yeah, he starts to rustle around in a drawer—

speaker: Travis
lines: Full of spare dwarf arms...

speaker: Griffin
lines: It's full of spare dwarf arms, and he just like, sticks one on, and you're just fine. Uh, no, he actually pulls out a syringe and jams it into Merle's arm, um, and you— it regrows. No. It’s, uh... The bleeding starts to slow a little bit, Merle, you actually wake up a little bit, you gain a little bit of consciousness as you feel this needle go into you—

speaker: Merle
lines: AAAAAAAH SHITTTT!

speaker: Griffin
lines: But.. the… I can't tell if that was real or not.

speaker: Travis
lines: He’s a very good actor.

speaker: Clint
lines: That's 'cause I'm an actor.

speaker: Griffin
lines: It was really terrific. But this thing is actually numbing your grisly wound pretty significantly. It's bringing you some pain relief. Not so much HP relief. But you're not in a horrific amount of pain anymore. And Killian's in the corner, she's using, she is speaking to the Director through a stone, and just like checking in, letting the home base know the situation, and Lucas asks, like,

speaker: Lucas
lines: What has been goin' ON out there?! What are you guys doing? What happened to Merle?

speaker: Magnus
lines: Well, he uh-

speaker: Merle
lines: I got disarmed.

speaker: Travis
lines: That's pretty good.

speaker: Magnus
lines: He started to crystallize, we were chopping on a door and magicking a door, then we heard Noelle scream, then we turned around, his hand was turning to crystal, and then his arm was turning to crystal, and I heroically - valiantly - chopped his arm off, against my wishes— he begged me— and I cut his arm off so that he wouldn't all crystal. And...

speaker: Taako
lines: Hey, listen, let me stop you right there. Lucas isn't your dad. You chopped your dad's arm off. You don't owe Lucas any explanation. Get us the fuck out of here!

speaker: Merle
lines: [slurred, moaning] You dirty prick, I can't believe you did this to me!

speaker: Magnus
lines: And now he's drunk.

speaker: Merle
lines: Oh the pain, kill me!

speaker: Lucas
lines: I can’t- We can't get out of here, we can't get out of here until we manage to stop the base from sinking into the sea and crystallizing the whole world. Did you forget why we're here in the first place? 'Cause I— well, I—

speaker: Magnus
lines: Oh, yeah.

speaker: Taako
lines: It's been like four episodes, my dude.

speaker: Lucas
lines: It's because I fucked up an experiment pretty bad. But we— that's not, this, the arm thing's not on me, I don't think!

speaker: Magnus
lines: Well, it was crystallizing—

speaker: Merle
lines: I blame that on everybody! [woozy laughing]

speaker: Magnus
lines: Merle, can you hear me?

speaker: Merle
lines: [woozy laughing] Yeah?

speaker: Magnus
lines: Why was your arm turning to crystal? What happened?

speaker: Merle
lines: [slow, gasping] God... lied.

speaker: Magnus
lines: God lied to you?

speaker: Merle
lines: [slow, slurred] God liiiiiied to meeee. You have the prettiest eyes.

speaker: Magnus
lines: Okay, yes I do, but focus up, what do you mean, God lied to you?

speaker: Merle
lines: I'll say it a different way. Godddddddddd liiiiiiiiiiied toooo meeee.

speaker: Travis
lines: I turn to Lucas.

speaker: Magnus
lines: Well, there you have it.

speaker: Lucas
lines: Okay, I guess God lied to him, that's what I'm picking up from the situation.

speaker: Merle
lines: And then some British guy [slurs] threw a crystal at me, and I grabbed it, and it hurt.

speaker: Magnus
lines: Some British guy...

speaker: Lucas
lines: No, I heard all of that, um, okay... I, I, it's that being. It's that being that's been attacking my lab. I don't know what the fuck that thing is, but I'm so sorry that you guys had to get mixed up in this. I didn't want any of this, you have to believe me.

speaker: Merle
lines: I think it was that guy that was married to Katy Perry. [Travis Russell Brand?] It sounded like that— Russell Brand. It sounded like Russell Brand took my hand. [wild laughter]

speaker: Magnus
lines: Lucas, is Russell Brand here?

speaker: Lucas
lines: No, he's not, hold on—

speaker: Griffin
lines: He rustles around and gets another syringe out and gives Merle another shot.

speaker: Merle
lines: In my butt! Give it to me in my butt!

speaker: Griffin
lines: As you shout 'give it to me in my butt!' [Clint laughs] you feel much more sedated.

speaker: Magnus
lines: There's a lot of shit going on, Lucas, [Merle snores loudly] that I feel like you're not being honest about? [Lucas You’re right, I--] Like this— compact—?

speaker: Lucas
lines: Oh, god, you went in my room?

speaker: Magnus
lines: I did, it was a fucking mess! And it looked like somebody stole all your gems before we got there.

speaker: Taako
lines: Clean your shit, dirty boy.

speaker: Lucas
lines: Wait, what?

speaker: Clint
lines: Bleed bleed bleed bleed bleed.

speaker: Lucas
lines: All my gems are gone? Listen, let’s- priorities! I'll explain the compact, I'll explain what you saw in there, I'll explain everything— we gotta get this guy taken care of!

speaker: Magnus
lines: He'll be fine! Tell me about the compact!

speaker: Clint
lines: Bleed bleed bleed bleed bleed.

speaker: Griffin
lines: He gets out a notepad, writes something down—

speaker: Clint
lines: I bleed all over it.

speaker: Griffin
lines: —and hands the note to Carey, and says,

speaker: Lucas
lines: Carey, I need you to get over to the bugbears and tell Jamie Green to bring me these supplies right now, or you can bring them back, tell her to give you these supplies and get back to me as quick as you can.

speaker: Griffin
lines: And she says, uh,

speaker: Carey
lines: Oh, you got it!

speaker: Griffin
lines: —and she grabs the note and just darts out of the room with blinding speed.

speaker: Magnus
lines: Wait, Carey!

speaker: Griffin
lines: She's gone. [Magnus Aw…] And he's doing some work, the bleeding is stopped, he's wrapped a big bandage around it— Merle— so it doesn't seem like Merle's gonna die, and he goes over to a desk in his corner and he starts tinkering with some stuff. He takes off his belt—

speaker: Magnus
lines: Whoa whoa whoa!

speaker: Lucas
lines: Don't worry about it! I've got a plan!

speaker: Griffin
lines: And he's working with it, he's got this petri dish that he's like mixing some sort of fluid in... and he's like,

speaker: Lucas
lines: As much as I want to, we can't leave, we can't get him out of here until we stop this thing from spreading. I, I, [sighs] I was down in the lower chambers of my lab—

speaker: Travis
lines: Late one night…

speaker: Lucas
lines: One night, and—[Griffin forgets the words to "Monster Mash"] monster boy? How does it— anyway— I was attacked by one of my robots. And I came up here to the medbay to, you know, treat my wound, and when I tried to leave, I found that crystal monster, or whatever it is— it's not, the monster itself isn't crystal, it's what's inhabiting the crystals— it attacked me in the decontamination chamber, and so I, I made my way back here into the med bay, and I flooded the room with anti-Conjuration energy because obviously, he's traveling between planes to move from spot to spot, [Magnus Obviously.] so I blocked it off— obviously, come on, that's like, 101— you guys figured that out by now, right?

speaker: Magnus
lines: Yep.

speaker: Lucas
lines: I, guys, I'm just so sorry, I promise, I'll get him patched up, I have an idea for how to patch him up, and we're gonna be able to, you'll see, we'll get out of this and we'll get down to my lower levels and I'll stop the crystal from spreading and— mission accomplished!

speaker: Magnus
lines: Great!

speaker: Lucas
lines: And you guys will say, 'Good work, Lucas! Thanks for the good teamwork!'

speaker: Magnus
lines: Sounds like us.

speaker: Taako
lines: Yeah, that sounds like something we'd do.

speaker: Merle
lines: [slurred] Shaaddup.

speaker: Clint
lines: Let me say one more thing.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Kay?

speaker: Clint
lines: Hello, beloved fans of Adventure Zone, it's me, Clint McElroy. Please write and drastically protest the treatment of your favorite dwarf cleric in this episode. Thank you.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Um. Nah, I think, I think—

speaker: Travis
lines: Listen, we've had a lot of fun here today, but I really just wanna drive home the point take the doors off your refrigerators before you throw them away.

speaker: Clint
lines: Because somebody can get their arm chopped off.

speaker: Travis
lines: That's what it always leads to.

speaker: Lucas
lines: Hey everybody, this is Lucas, a fictional character. I do want to step outside of kayfabe for a second and tell you, for real though, the thing about the refrigerators, that one was on me, and if I had taken it off, I'm pretty sure Merle would still have both of the arms. I don't, I'm not sure how it's connected, but hey, Sliding Doors! Have you seen that movie? Anyway, later! This is me, Lucas, [crosstalk] on the Sliding Doors Council.

speaker: Travis
lines: [over] Fading back into the ether.

speaker: Justin
lines: Hi. This is Justin McElroy. I'm an actor who plays the role of Taako on The Adventure Zone. I just wanted to say... I don't feel like I really did anything that funny this time around, [background laughter] but hey, get 'em next time, I guess...
